title: AI Coaching v2.0: Advanced Real-time Intelligence
excerpt: Revolutionary upgrade to our AI coaching engine with enhanced competitive intelligence, real-time battle cards, and advanced deal scoring algorithms.

content.content: We're excited to announce the release of AI Coaching v2.0, our most significant update yet. This release introduces groundbreaking features that will transform how your sales team approaches enterprise deals.

content.title: Enhanced Competitive Intelligence
content.description: Real-time battle cards with dynamic competitor analysis and positioning strategies.
content.impact: 45% higher win rates against enterprise competitors

content.title: Advanced Deal Scoring
content.description: AI-powered deal risk assessment with predictive close probability.
content.impact: 92% forecast accuracy achieved in beta testing

content.title: Multi-stakeholder Tracking
content.description: Intelligent stakeholder mapping and influence analysis for complex enterprise deals.

items: 50% faster response time for real-time suggestions
Enhanced integration with Salesforce and HubSpot
Advanced analytics dashboard with custom reporting
Fixed audio sync issues in call recordings
